original_text: Then the goats for the sin offering were brought to the king and the assembly, and they laid their hands on them,
korean_text: 이에 속죄제물로 드릴 숫염소들을 왕과 회중 앞으로 끌어오매 그들이 그 위에 안수하고

sentences.original_text: Then the goats for the sin offering
were brought to the king and the assembly,
and they laid their hands on them,
